Security

So I’m writing code…

  • Have you had a look at the OWASP Top 10?
  • Have you checked out the CWE Top 25?

So I’ve got an AWS space…

  • Enable Multi-Factor Authentication on all user accounts in your space.
  • Run Cloudsploit regularly to audit the security of the infrastructure in your space.
  • Have a read of the AWS security whitepapers.
  • Ensure you’re not committing your AWS credentials to public repositories. One solution could be git-secrets.
  • If you have premium support enabled on your AWS account, you can use AWS Trusted Advisor, which can help you reduce cost, increase performance, and improve security by optimizing your AWS environment. Note that business support incurs an additional fee on your account.
  • Familiarise yourself with GA security policies on the intranet. Remember you can get in touch with the ICTIS Security team if you have any questions about IT security.
